abstract: An NBC report on the similarities between the national and Massachusetts health care plans is timed perfectly for Mitt Romney's opponents.
snippet: An NBC report on the similarities between the national and Massachusetts health care plans is timed perfectly for Mitt Romney's opponents.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: HANOVER, N.H. -- If there's one thing that Mitt Romney is bracing for at Tuesday night's debate, it is an assault on his health care record as governor of Massachusetts.

headline.main: Romney Readies for Health Care Attacks at Debate
